name: Cocoto Alien Brick Breaker
description:
Cocoto renews an arcade game classic!

The devilish Cocoto is back in an incredibly addictive game, brilliantly renewing the great brick breaker classic! Travel through the 5 planets of Cocotoâ€™s universe to protect them from alien fire by firing back their projectiles with your magic shield. Progress through the game confronting waves of more and more enemies with increasingly amusing weapons, and unlock new powers for your shield.

Story, Arcade and Classic modes
50 levels
13 ultra-powerful shields!
A myriad of enemies with increasingly amazing powers
disclaimer: You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
